Translations.Text: O vi kred vi ne pren usury compounded over kaj over Observ DI ke vi sukces
Vi obe DI messenger ke vi ating mercy
Vi eagerly race forgiveness your Lord Paradise whose width encompasses heavens ter; gxi awaits des righteous
who don charity bon temp, tro mav temp. Ili est suppressors anger pardoners popol. DI AM DES charitable
Ili fal pek wrong their anim ili memor DI pet forgiveness their pek! - who forgives pek escept DI! - Ili ne persist en pek knowingly
Their recompense est forgiveness their Lord gxarden flu streams ili abide therein forever Ki ben rekompenc workers
Precedents set vi en des preter; roam ter not consequences unbelievers
This est proclamation popol guidance enlightenment por des righteous
Vi ne waver nor shall vi grieve vi est ultimate victors vi est believers
Vi sufer hardship enemy ankaux sufer sam hardship. Ni altern tag victory kaj defeat among des popol! DI TIEL DISTING PRAV believers BEN kelk da VI martyrdom! DI dislikes injustice
DI TIEL toughens those kred humiliates disbelievers
Vi expect enter Paradise DI disting those among vi who strive sen disting those est steadfast
Vi uz long death vi vizagx gxi! Tuj vi vizagx gxi dekstr your okul
